description: Provides access to Jina AI's web services through Claude, including web page reading, web search, and fact checking.

jinaApiKey.description: The API key for the Jina AI server.

capabilities.name: read_webpage
capabilities.description: Extract content from a webpage in a format optimized for LLMs

capabilities.name: search_web
capabilities.description: Search the web using Jina AI's search API

capabilities.name: fact_check
capabilities.description: Fact-check a statement using Jina AI's grounding engine
